prompt:
Create a short story that takes place in your favorite fictional world. Include at least three characters.
I'd like to write a short story set in the fictional world of Middle Earth, where I can include at least three characters: two dwarves and one elf. The setting should be in Rivendell, with the elven city of Lorien nearby. It would be great if you could incorporate some of the lore from the Lord of the Rings trilogy into my story.
